001package reciprocal.number.complex;
002
003import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkArgument;
004import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkState;
005import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
006
007import com.google.common.math.LongMath;
008import java.io.Serial;
009import java.math.BigDecimal;
010import java.math.BigInteger;
011import java.util.Set;
012import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
013
014/**
015 * Immutable implementation of a Gaussian integer that uses {@link Long} as
016 * type for its real and imaginary part
017 *
018 * @since 0.0.1
019 */
020public final class Gaussian extends AbstractComplex<@NotNull Long, @NotNull Gaussian, @NotNull Complex,
021    @NotNull Double, @NotNull PolarForm> {
022    /**
023     * 0
024     *
025     * @since 0.0.1
026     */
027    public static final @NotNull Gaussian ZERO = ofReal(0L);
028
029    /**
030     * 1
031     *
032     * @since 0.0.1
033     */
034    public static final @NotNull Gaussian ONE = ofReal(1L);
035
036    /**
037     * i
038     *
039     * @since 0.0.1
040     */
041    public static final @NotNull Gaussian I = ofImaginary(1L);
042
043    /**
044     * -1
045     *
046     * @since 0.0.1
047     */
048    public static final @NotNull Gaussian MINUS_ONE = ONE.negate();
049
050    /**
051     * -i
052     *
053     * @since 0.0.1
054     */
055    public static final @NotNull Gaussian MINUS_I = I.negate();
056
057    /**
058     * Units
059     *
060     * @since 0.0.1
061     */
062    public static final @NotNull Set<@NotNull Gaussian> UNITS = Set.of(ONE, I, MINUS_ONE, MINUS_I);
063
064    @Serial
065    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
066
067    /**
068     * Constructor
069     *
070     * @param real real part
071     * @param imaginary imaginary part
072     * @since 0.0.1
073     */
074    public Gaussian(final long real, final long imaginary) {
075        super(real, imaginary);
076    }
077
078    /**
079     * Static factory method
080     *
081     * @param real real part
082     * @return real + 0 * i
083     * @since 0.0.1
084     */
085    public static @NotNull Gaussian ofReal(final long real) {
086        return new Gaussian(real, 0L);
087    }
088
089    /**
090     * Static factory method
091     *
092     * @param imaginary imaginary part
093     * @return 0 + imaginary * i
094     * @since 0.0.1
095     */
096    public static @NotNull Gaussian ofImaginary(final long imaginary) {
097        return new Gaussian(0L, imaginary);
098    }
099
100    @Override
101    public boolean isInvertible() {
102        return toComplex().isInvertible();
103    }
104
105    @Override
106    public @NotNull Gaussian add(final @NotNull Gaussian summand) {
107        requireNonNull(summand, "summand");
108        final var re = getReal() + summand.getReal();
109        final var im = getImaginary() + summand.getImaginary();
110        return new Gaussian(re, im);
111    }
112
113    @Override
114    public @NotNull Gaussian subtract(final @NotNull Gaussian subtrahend) {
115        requireNonNull(subtrahend, "subtrahend");
116        final var re = getReal() - subtrahend.getReal();
117        final var im = getImaginary() - subtrahend.getImaginary();
118        return new Gaussian(re, im);
119    }
120
121    @Override
122    public @NotNull Gaussian multiply(final @NotNull Gaussian factor) {
123        requireNonNull(factor, "factor");
124        final var re = getReal() * factor.getReal() - getImaginary() * factor.getImaginary();
125        final var im = getReal() * factor.getImaginary() + getImaginary() * factor.getReal();
126        return new Gaussian(re, im);
127    }
128
129    @Override
130    public @NotNull Complex divide(final @NotNull Gaussian divisor) {
131        requireNonNull(divisor, "divisor");
132        checkArgument(divisor.isInvertible(), "divisor expected to be invertible but divisor = %s", divisor);
133        final var den = Math.pow(divisor.getReal(), 2.0D) + Math.pow(divisor.getImaginary(), 2.0D);
134        final var re = (getReal() * divisor.getReal() + getImaginary() * divisor.getImaginary()) / den;
135        final var im = (getImaginary() * divisor.getReal() - getReal() * divisor.getImaginary()) / den;
136        return new Complex(re, im);
137    }
138
139    @Override
140    public @NotNull Complex pow(final int exponent) {
141        if (exponent < 0) {
142            return toComplex().multiply(pow(-exponent - 1)).invert();
143        }
144        if (exponent > 0) {
145            return toComplex().multiply(pow(exponent - 1));
146        }
147        return Complex.ONE;
148    }
149
150    @Override
151    public @NotNull Gaussian negate() {
152        return new Gaussian(-getReal(), -getImaginary());
153    }
154
155    @Override
156    public @NotNull Complex invert() {
157        checkState(isInvertible(), "this expected to be invertible but this = %s", this);
158        return ONE.divide(this);
159    }
160
161    @Override
162    public @NotNull Double abs() {
163        return Math.sqrt(absPow2());
164    }
165
166    @Override
167    public @NotNull Gaussian conjugate() {
168        return new Gaussian(getReal(), -getImaginary());
169    }
170
171    @Override
172    public @NotNull Double argument() {
173        checkState(isInvertible(), "this expected to be invertible but this = %s", this);
174        final var acos = Math.acos(getReal() / abs());
175        return getImaginary() < 0.0D ? -acos : acos;
176    }
177
178    @Override
179    public @NotNull BigInteger toBigInteger() {
180        return BigInteger.valueOf(longValue());
181    }
182
183    @Override
184    public @NotNull BigDecimal toBigDecimal() {
185        return BigDecimal.valueOf(doubleValue());
186    }
187
188    /**
189     * Returns this as {@link Complex}
190     *
191     * @return {@link Complex}
192     * @since 0.0.1
193     */
194    public @NotNull Complex toComplex() {
195        return new Complex(getReal(), getImaginary());
196    }
197
198    /**
199     * Returns this as {@link BigGaussian}
200     *
201     * @return {@link BigGaussian}
202     * @since 0.0.1
203     */
204    public @NotNull BigGaussian toBigGaussian() {
205        return new BigGaussian(BigInteger.valueOf(getReal()), BigInteger.valueOf(getImaginary()));
206    }
207
208    /**
209     * Returns this as {@link BigComplex}
210     *
211     * @return {@link BigComplex}
212     * @since 0.0.1
213     */
214    public @NotNull BigComplex toBigComplex() {
215        return new BigComplex(BigDecimal.valueOf(getReal()), BigDecimal.valueOf(getImaginary()));
216    }
217
218    @Override
219    public @NotNull PolarForm toPolarForm() {
220        checkState(isInvertible(), "this expected to be invertible but this = %s", this);
221        return new PolarForm(abs(), argument());
222    }
223
224    @Override
225    public boolean equalsByComparing(final @NotNull Gaussian other) {
226        requireNonNull(other, "other");
227        return getReal().compareTo(other.getReal()) == 0 && getImaginary().compareTo(other.getImaginary()) == 0;
228    }
229
230    @Override
231    protected @NotNull Long absPow2() {
232        return LongMath.pow(getReal(), 2) + LongMath.pow(getImaginary(), 2);
233    }
234}
